roleset.name: to collect
roleset.note: GATHER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gather' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from gather.01-v)
GATHERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from gathering.01-n)

example.name: gather-v: transitive
example.text: With the harvest winding down , however , some analysts are speculating that prices might jump in some regions as [U.S. exporters]-1 try [*-1]to gather the corn [0] they are obligated [*-3] to deliver [*T*-2] .
example.arg: the corn [0] they are obligated [*-3]to deliver [*T*-2]

example.name: gather-v: with Arg2
example.text: His crude device worked : The lower teeth gathered the leaves into a pile , while the higher , harder teeth moved the top of the pile .
example.arg: while the higher , harder teeth moved the top of the pile

example.name: gather-v: with Arg3
example.text: Mr. Iken , it turned out [*T*-1] , was a private detective using [a hidden tape recorder]-2 [*-2] to gather information for Sony .

roleset.name: understand, deduce
roleset.note: GATHER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls deduce-97.2. (from gather.02-v)

example.name: gather-v: args 0, 1
example.text: I gather some recent stuff is not all so benevolent , but I figure a regular marketplace should take care of modifying that .
example.arg: some recent stuff is not all so benevolent

roleset.name: come together, meet
roleset.note: GATHERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT (from gathering.02-n)

example.name: gather-v: passive
example.text: He surveys [the prospective investors]-1 gathered [*]-1 in the board room of the Philippine government 's Asset Privatization Trust for the sale of a 36 % interest in the country 's largest paper mill .
example.arg: in the board room of the Philippine government 's Asset Privatization Trust
for the sale of a 36 % interest in the country 's largest paper mill

example.name: gather-v: intransitive
example.text: You might be interested [*-1] to know that baseball , not survival , appeared [*-2]to be the first thought of most of the crowd of 60,000-odd that [*T*-3] had gathered at Candlestick at 5:04 p.m. Tuesday , a half-hour before game time , when the quake struck .
example.arg: at 5:04 p.m. Tuesday , a half-hour before game time
